mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Nedrow, Jacob Patient Age: 32. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right leg by musket bullet which entered. Location Wounded: Petersburg, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/06/18. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Discharged from service .
